thread.title: Prince and Madonna party like it’s 1999 at exclusive private show
thread.title_full: Prince and Madonna party like it’s 1999 at exclusive private show | DailyTelegraph

author: New York Post and Network Writers
title: Prince and Madonna party like it’s 1999 at exclusive private show
text:
MADONNA and Prince partied together after the Queen of Pop’s “Rebel Heart” concert in Minneapolis.
The singer, 57, and her dancers visited Prince’s Paisley Park studios — where he put on an intimate show for just 33 fans, reports the New York Post .
The two icons snuck off to another section as Madonna’s posse turned the room into a big dance party, according to local radio station the Current. She later returned, with Prince appearing soon after.
Music legend ... Madonna performs at the 57th annual Grammy Awards. Prince was said to be awe-struck by Madge. Picture: John Shearer/Invision/AP He performed 10 songs and appeared “awe-struck by Madge”, wrote Andrea Swensson on the station’s blog. “After the sixth song of the set, Prince leaned down and whispered something back and forth with Madonna, and then hopped back up to his keyboards and simply said, ‘Cool’.”
This story first appeared in the New York Post .
Private show ... Prince and Madonna can both sell out arenas, but for one night only, the superstar played exclusively for the Material Girl. Picture: AFP/Robyn Beck Originally published as Prince’s private show for Madonna
